item.title: EU and the U.S. Strike Trade Deal Described as Political Coup for Trump and a ‘Dark Day’ for Europe
item.description: After months of tense negotiations, U.S. President Donald Trump and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen have reached a trade deal that will set a 15% U.S. tariff on most goods imported

item.title: EU and the U.S. Strike Trade Deal Described as Political Coup for Trump and a ‘Dark Day’ for Europe
item.description: After months of tense negotiations, U.S. President Donald Trump and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen have reached a trade deal that will set a 15% U.S. tariff on most goods imported
